data.name: NightmareScript#7    Binary to Hexadecimal Conversion
data.description:
---
NightmareScript
----
NightmareScript is JavaScript without alpha-numeric characters.

The only permitted characters are:

! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ + - | < > . , ' ; : " ` ~ = ? /\ { } [ ]

Spaces and new lines are also acceptable.

----
Task
----

Convert a Binary string to a Hexadecimal string. 

----
Rules
----

Character limit of 500 to prevent copy pasting from tools like JSF**K.

Golfing encouraged but not required ;)

Binary strings will always have a length divisble by 4.

Your Hexadecimal string should use lowercase letters ```ff0f```

You will have to convert 999 random 16384 bit strings in random tests so efficiency matters.
